description: When Florida’s lawyers tried to defend the state’s social media age restriction law by claiming it’s “well known” that platforms harm children, they probably weren’t expecting to get schooled on moral panics by a judge citing his own experiences with… Dungeons & Dragons. But that’s exactly what happened in a recent hearing challenging Florida’s unconstitutional […]
title: Judge Uses D&D’s Failure To Make Him Worship Satan To School Florida On Social Media Moral Panics

description: Support us on Patreon » At long last, we’ve got a fresh new original episode for you! title: Techdirt Podcast Episode 410: Murder The Truth

description: When a president uses executive power to not just blacklist but effectively destroy a major law firm, solely for representing political opponents, it means he’s given up any pretense that he’s not an authoritarian hellbent on destroying anyone who opposes him through any means necessary. Donald Trump’s executive order targeting Perkins Coie isn’t just an […]
title: Trump’s Latest Weapon Against Critics: Destroying Their Lawyers

description: There are many reasons a person might feel compelled to purchase a Tesla Cybertruck. Most of those reasons are tied to Elon Musk himself. title: Cybertruck Owners Are Asking Congressional Reps To Protect Them From People Who Don’t Like Cybertruck Owners

description: As somebody who has covered the telecom and media industries professionally for decades, there’s simply of no limit of problems in both sectors competent federal regulators could be taking aim at. Broadband price gouging by monopolies, widespread telecom privacy and security failures, or the obvious harm of unchecked media consolidation all come quickly to mind. […]
title: Trump FCC Boss Brendan Carr Harasses Google For Not Carrying Right Wing Religious Programming

description: None of this will undo this extremely unnecessary killing. But it will at least provide more case law that will hopefully deter cops from shooting first and retiring mid-investigation later. This is one of the most horrific killings by police officers that don’t involve Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin. Responding to a welfare check call, […]
title: 5th Circuit: No Immunity For Cop Who Killed Woman By Shooting Her Through Her Own Backyard Window
